title: Poppy's new W stops enemy dashes, AND deals damage to them for trying.

replies.body: FUCK YOU RIVEN! FUCK YOU AND YOUR DASHES!
I just realized riven will have it even worse than yasuo. Yasuo can just avoid using E, but riven... oh boy.
Wait, does it stop her Q as well or just her E?
Stops any form of dash within range I believe. That would include riven Qs is my bet.
If this is true then I'm getting her just for that fact alone .__.

(copy and pasted)

Sad day, riven's Qs don't count as dashes(?)
Wiki says Broken Wings is considered a dash.
I would try to test it, problem is nobody plays riven on PBE.

50k on Riven
PFT it's ok she isn't even top 3 for me
time to main Poppy :D
Sad day, riven's Qs don't count as dashes(?)
Oh hue. ;)

She's gonna be the melee version of Janna. Imagine both of them on one team. lmao GL to the enemy team engaging... like ever.

And guess Malph isn't gonna be "rock solid" any more {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Pretty sure his ult makes him immune to CC, so he can just go "FUCK YOUR BARRIER I AM A ROCK". Same with Sion and Vi.
OH YEAAAAAH. Malph always rock solid. Thank you. Im so happy {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Only thing that will stop Malph is dying. Nothing can prevent the Rock from ulting.
http://33.media.tumblr.com/094bc52a47482a1b670677a837973f73/tumblr_n5hoxnXcfA1twpdgco1_400.gif
New Poppy says "screw you mobile champs"
These kind of posts are very cringy.
Sorry about that...
{{champion:429}} is royally fucked.

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7aOQgwE4,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-25T09:49:32.330+0000)
>
> {{champion:429}} is royally fucked.

Would it act as a root since she can't do the typical move and attack?
Every time she tries to attack, she takes between 70 and 230 damage, depending on the rank in the skill.

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7aOQgwE4,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-11-25T18:49:41.193+0000)
>
> Every time she tries to attack, she takes between 70 and 230 damage, depending on the rank in the skill.

It has a 70% ap ratio too lelelellelelel this will be a must pick support counter to kali.

So, I guess the reworked Poppy is basically a nerf for all mobile champs.
Riot's getting really creative with those.
I love her new W after being assaulted by so many Yasuos.
Sounds like something suited to an immobile Juggernaut
Minus her E, she plays similarly to a juggernaut.
The best part is the loud 'DONK' they make.
